Very fun game to play with friends, my biggest problem with this game are the extra characters for DLC. I'm a Stranger Things fan and when I see the Demogorgan and Steve Harrington as playable characters I got really excited, until I realized the price tag on it. Worse part is that it's not just Stranger Things there's Saw, Scream, Halloween, Nightmare on Elm Street, and Texas Chainsaw Massacre DLC's. - Me in Feb 2020

2 years later Dead by Daylight (DBD) is still very fun to play with friends, especially in custom matches. The DLC is still expensive if you want play as a lot of your favorite horror slashers/survivors. What saves it is the sheer variety of DLC this game has. Since I posted that review in Feburary of 2020 they released Silent Hill, Resident Evil, Hellraiser, and The Ring DLC. All of those DLC minus the Stranger Things DLC because they had to remove it in November of 2021 due to licensing issues (please bring it back btw,) you have plenty of your favorite characters to choose from, which is a plus in my book. The only real negatives I can think of are some outdated animations for some of the characters and the toxic community. Which personally brings the game down for me, but overall a solid game 7.5/10

-А У МЕНЯ СКИЛЛЧЕК ПРОЛАГАЛ , ИЗИ МИНУС Я
-(НЮРСА И РИН ЗАШЛИ В ЧАТ) ДАРОВА ВСЕМ БАЛАНСА НА СЕГОДНЯ НЕ БУДЕТ 
-РАЗРАБЫ СДЕЛАЙТЕ СЕРВЕРА И ПОФИКСИТЕ ХИТБОКСЫ
-(начало катки)НАЙС КАРТА ВЫПАЛА ,ЛИВАЕМ ПАЦАНЫ

かなりハマっているゲームです。生存者、殺人鬼どちらもプレイしています。（私はキラーが好きです）最近はキラーナーフが多い印象ですが野良基準ならこれぐらいで適正かなと思います。なのでボイスチャットパーティになんらかの処置をしていただきたいですね。ホラーテイストの対戦ゲームということもあってか熱くなりがちですので、そのへんのユーザビリティを向上してほしいです。切断（ペナルティはあります）、煽り、これさえなければとてもおすすめできます。ゲーム自体は最高です！
